mission.title: Our mission
mission.content: Astrale partners with transport and logistics companies to optimize their administrative processes. As a partner, we integrate automation solutions that adapt to your existing workflows, without disrupting your habits or requiring your teams to adopt new tools.

values.title: Our values
values.content: Simplicity, efficiency and compliance guide every decision we make. We believe automation should be invisible: your teams continue working as before, while Astrale handles the rest in the background.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Astrale, we take the protection of your personal information very seriously. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information, in accordance with Quebec's Law 25 (Act to modernize legislative provisions respecting the protection of personal information) and applicable Canadian federal laws.

collected.title: 1. Personal information collected
collected.intro: We collect the following personal information when you use our site or services:

purposes.title: 2. Purposes of collection
purposes.intro: We collect and use your personal information only for the following purposes:

items.title: Respond to your requests
items.content: Process and respond to your questions, demo requests, or information requests.

items.title: Improve our services
items.content: Analyze site usage to improve user experience.

items.title: Communications
items.content: Send you information about our services (with your consent).

items.title: Legal compliance
items.content: Meet our legal and regulatory obligations.

consent.title: 3. Legal basis and consent
consent.content: In accordance with Law 25, we collect your personal information only with your explicit consent, except in cases where the law authorizes us to collect it without consent.
consent.notice: Your consent is free, informed, and given for specific purposes. You may withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us.

sharing.title: 4. Sharing with third parties
sharing.intro: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.
sharing.content: We may share your information only in the following cases:

items.title: Service providers
items.content: With providers who help us deliver our services (hosting, analytics), subject to strict confidentiality clauses.

items.title: Legal obligations
items.content: When required by law or in response to a valid request from competent authorities.

items.title: Protection of rights
items.content: To protect our rights, safety, or that of third parties.

security.title: 5. Security measures
security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against:

rights.title: 6. Your rights (Law 25)
rights.intro: In accordance with Law 25 and applicable laws, you have the following rights regarding your personal information:

items.title: Right of access
items.content: You may request access to the personal information we hold about you.

items.title: Right of rectification
items.content: You may request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information.

items.title: Right to erasure
items.content: You may request deletion of your personal information, subject to our legal retention obligations.

items.title: Right to portability
items.content: You may request to receive your information in a structured, commonly used format (in effect since September 2024).

items.title: Right to withdraw consent
items.content: You may withdraw your consent at any time for future processing of your information.

rights.outro: To exercise your rights, please contact us at {email}. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.intro: In accordance with Law 25, cookies and tracking technologies are disabled by default on our site.

necessary.title: Strictly necessary cookies
necessary.content: Essential for the site to function. Do not require consent.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies (optional)
analytics.content: Help us understand how visitors use the site. Only enabled with your explicit consent.

cookies.outro: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through your browser settings.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications to this policy
modifications.content1: We may update this privacy policy periodically. The date of the last update is indicated at the top of this page.
modifications.content2: In case of significant changes, we will notify you by email or by a visible notice on our site.
